contents: The Business Source License (this document, or the “License”) is not an Open Source license. However, the Licensed Work will eventually be made available under an Open Source License, as stated in this License. This is a paramaterized license. The license parameters are: restrictions on usage, a change date, and the open source license that will govern usage of the software after the change date.

Whether the license includes a notice obligation or similar which can be fulfilled by adding the relevant copyright notices and the license text into the project/product notice file.
